text:
General Yorin Thauram leads [[Karrnath]]'s [[White Lions]] military police force from its headquarters in [[Korth]]. He has served his nation loyally for all of his 130 years, and fought in every major Karrnathi campaign in the [[Last War]]. Today, he is known for personally interrogating noteworthy prisoners before turning them over to the Justice Ministry for punishment.

As a young man, General Thauram served as one of [[Kaius I|Kaius ir'Wynarn I]]'s royal bodyguards; he finds the [[current king|Kaius ir'Wynarn III]]'s resemblence to Kaius I to be remarkable, and wonders whether he is using magic to make himself appear more like his great-grandfather.

General Thauram's daughter [[Kelani|Kelani Thauram]] is a famous actress in [[Sharn]].
title: Yorin Thauram
